thread.section_title: Holiday Inn San Francisco - Intl Airport - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (South San Francisco, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Old and outdated
thread.title_full: Old and outdated - Review of Holiday Inn San Francisco - Intl Airport, South San Francisco, CA - TripAdvisor

author: MIke M
title: Old and outdated
text: If you like old worn out furniture and stained drapes this is the place for you. You even get to pay to park while you stay. Imagine that, someone traveling on business with a rental car and the hotel here thinks that they are so special they can charge to park. Maybe next they will start charging for hot water to shower and install coin meters for the electricity for lights. This place is overpriced for what you get.
